director.name: 马蒂亚·法利亚 Márcia Faria

introduction: A middle class young woman, Dora, graduates in architecture and to make ends meet takes a course in flower arranging while also working part-time as a salesperson in a luxury store on Oscar Freire. Dora meets Beto, a lobbyist who wins her attention and after their first date, Dora finds an envelope with money in her bag. Although at first, she is unable to understand why Beto put it there, however, as the money came at an opportune time, Dora pays her bills and from that moment on, her fate into the world of high-class escorts is sealed.
